title: Sila buys new factory to produce next-gen EV battery tech on US soil - TechCrunch
content: Sila buys new factory to produce next-gen EV battery tech on US soil  TechCrunch
description: Battery technology company Sila announced the purchase of a new facility in Washington state that will see its next-generation battery chemistry in hundreds of thousands of electric vehicles by the end of 2026, according to the company. The 600,000-square-foot factory in Moses Lake, Washington, wilâ€¦
